How This Page Was Built

The image below shows the step ‘How It Works: The Building Blocks’ being edited within Visual Studio Code using the Docs Assembler extension.

  • Left (File Explorer): The DocumentationHell.tsmap file is selected, showing the map’s structure.
  • Center (Map View): The step ‘How It Works: The Building Blocks’ is selected in the Map Editor.
  • Right (Markdown Editor): The content of the step is open for editing.
